Description: Manage the complete project lifecycle and increase profitability with a unified ERP system for ambitious project-centric firms.
Name: Deltek Vision

Methods.Name: Get New Contacts
Methods.Description: Get new contacts since the last run time. Custom fields can be added to the response body with the Field Location: RECS.[REC].ContactCustomTabFields.ROW.<FIELD_NAME> where FIELD_NAME is the field name in the ContactCustomTabFields table.

Methods.Name: Add Contact
Methods.Description: Adds a contact with the specified attributes to the database. Custom fields can be added to the request body with the Field Location: CustomDataIn.<FIELD_NAME> where FIELD_NAME is the field name in the ContactCustomTabFields table.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Deletes a contact from the database by its ID.

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Get new and updated contacts since the last run time. Custom fields can be added to the response body with the Field Location: RECS.[REC].ContactCustomTabFields.ROW.<FIELD_NAME> where FIELD_NAME is the field name in the ContactCustomTabFields table.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Gets a single contact by its Contact ID. Custom fields can be added to the response body with the Field Location: RECS.[REC].ContactCustomTabFields.ROW.<FIELD_NAME> where FIELD_NAME is the field name in the ContactCustomTabFields table.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Update an existing contact in the database. Custom fields can be added to the request body with the Field Location: CustomDataIn.<FIELD_NAME> where FIELD_NAME is the field name in the ContactCustomTabFields table.

Methods.Name: Add/Update Contact
Methods.Description: Adds or updates a contact with the specified attributes to the database. Custom fields can be added to the request body with the Field Location: CustomDataIn.<FIELD_NAME> where FIELD_NAME is the field name in the ContactCustomTabFields table.

Methods.Name: Get Contact By Email
Methods.Description: Gets a single contact by its email address. Custom fields can be added to the response body with the Field Location: RECS.[REC].ContactCustomTabFields.ROW.<FIELD_NAME> where FIELD_NAME is the field name in the ContactCustomTabFields table.
